summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 BLUE ROCK ALUMINUM TRAILER (N/A) EQUIPPED WITH THE 2007 SEGURA (N/A )TIRES, SIZE 175/80/R13. WHILE THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 65 MPH, THE TREAD SEPARATED FROM THE TIRE AND DESTROYED THE FENDER ATTACHED TO THE TRAILER FRAME. THE CONTACT REPLACED THE TIRE WITH THE SPARE TIRE. ALSO THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FAILURE OCCURRED ANOTHER TIME WITH ONE OF THE OTHER TIRES. THE FAILURE MILEAGE ON THE TIRE WAS 5,000.   UPDATED 01/18/11 *BF  UPDATED 02/22/11
